Detailed Description

EXtrinsic Information Transfer (EXIT) chart for Parallel Concatenated Convolutional Codes (PCCCs) of coding rate 1/3.

Computes the Transfer Characteristics of the two SISO RSC modules used in the turbo decoder for PCCCs at a given Signal to Noise Ratio (SNR).

Reference: S. ten Brink, ''Convergence behavior of iteratively decoded parallel concatenated codes,`` IEEE Transactions on Communications, vol. 49, pp. 1727-1737, Oct. 2001
